instructions: put the plate on top of the charger
put the napkin on top of the plate pointing vertically
put the dinner fork on the left side of the plate with its prongs pointing upward
put the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with its prongs pointing upwards
put the dinner knife to the right of the plate with its blade pointed toward the plate
put the tea spoon to the right of the dinner knife with its bowl pointed upward
put the soup spoon to the right of the tea spoon with its bowl pointed upward
put the water glass above and to the right of the charger
put the wine glass to the right of the water glass
put the wine glass below the other wine glass and above the spoons
put the coffee cup to the right of the wine glass
put the bread plate above and to the left of the charger and above the forks
place the butter knife on top of the bread plate horizontally
place the dessert fork above the charger horizontally with its prongs facing the water glass
put the dessert spoon between the dessert fork and the charger with its bowl facing the bread plate
